alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region; Northern High Plains; Southern High Plains; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 1:46PM MST until January 22 at 8:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM SATURDAY TO 8 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 8 inches. Winds gusting between 65 and 85 mph at times. * WHERE...The Rocky Mountain Front and adjacent foothills and plains. * WHEN...From 8 PM Saturday to 8 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: East Glacier Park Region; Northern High Plains; Southern High Plains; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
